```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
dat = read_csv("../data_output/surveys_cleaned.csv")
```

```{r}
dp = "Dipodomys"

dat %>%
  filter(genus == dp, hindfoot_length <= 35)
```

```{r}
dat %>%
  filter(sex == "M", year == 1980) %>% 
  select(month, day, species, hindfoot_length) %>% 
  arrange(month, day)
```

```{r}
dat %>%
  group_by(hindfoot_length < 6) %>% 
  summarise(mean = mean(hindfoot_length), n = n())
```
